name: Not a Typical Fate
description:
Not a Typical Fate is a school project of first year of game design. It was made as a semestrial project. We had to create a plateformer and we decided to go into the "one button platformer" way; in which you embody a princess who tries to run away from her fate. It's was a project done in 3 month during the year 2017-2018.

We were 4 to work on it :

  • Guillaume Dantec - Level Design, Game Design.
  •  Axel Van Ruymbeke - Artistic Design, Character Design, Game Design.
  • Alexandre Farcy - Programation, Sound Design.
  •  Bryan Bachelet - Programation, Debug, Level Design.

It's possible you find some bugs, we apologize for that and hope you will understand.

Please, feel free to leave a feedback and any comments which could help us improve the game.
Thanks for your time and have fun playing Not a Typical Fate .
